Sleep Inside a Gentle Blizzard, Wake Up Slightly Earlier Than You Went to Bed

I'm Greg "Pawpaw" Mott. Suburban dad, former assistant treasurer of the HOA, current innkeeper of this glass dome. My cats and I turned our split-level into a bed-and-breakfast after a tragic fondue night and a very forgiving zoning board. Tuesdays run backwards here. We manage.

Local Feature: The HOA Finally Stopped Asking Questions

Minutes note: "No one can explain Tuesday but the muffins are persuasive."

Need-to-Know Meowformation

FAQ, but Honest

Is this legally a snow globe?

Our attorney says it is "architecturally adjacent to a decorative vessel." That is enough for us and probably enough for you.

What exactly happens on Tuesdays?

Time runs backward from 11:59 PM to 12:01 AM. You may relive dinner in reverse, but crumbs still count as crumbs.

Can I bring my own cat?

Yes. We ask for one courtesy sniff with staff cats and proof your cat can hear the word "no" at least one time out of four.

Is this a wedding venue or a B&B?

Both. Love and waffles have never respected categories.

Why does everyone call you Pawpaw?

Long story short: one toddler, one cat tree, one neighborhood cookout, no survivors of dignity.

Still unsure? Call our landline and leave a message after the tone and before the third meow. We return calls in under 24 hours, unless Tuesday already un-happened.
